      • setGuessNum

        public void setGuessNum(int guessNum)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Set guessNum value. If parameter guessNum value greater than max random number set value then throw exception
        Parameters:
        guessNum - Integer user guess number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Guess number should be less or equal to [MAX_RANDOM_NUM]
